item.title: India and Pakistan’s Air Battle Is Over. Their Water War Has Begun.
item.description: Though the two neighbors declared a cease-fire this month, a crucial water-sharing treaty remains at risk.

item.title: Experts Who Warn of Risks Posed by Chinese Students Are Skeptical of Trump Plan
item.description: Some former spy-hunters see the State Department’s plan to revoke visas of some Chinese college students as heavy-handed and counterproductive.
